{Talos}

    Sitting alone in the ready room watching the read out. Energy signals
were unmistakable. He'd only been briefed lightly on this technology, their
sentinel system wasn't even installed yet but he had to act. Reaching for
the comm he hit the all decks switch, "Attention maximals, attention
maximals. I have a lock on megatrons signal and an energy source of great
power, I want every able bodied maximal to report for combat duty
immeadiately and head to these co-ordinates. Hot Rod, you too, secure our
guest in her quarters, I don't know how many preds are going to be able to
answer Megatrons call so I need everyone out there. Move it people! Move
it!"

    Rushing from the ready room  he grabbed a blast sheild from the
equipment rack by the front hatch. Grimlock was already there the hatch
halfway open. "Me Grimlock say we crush Megatron!"

    Talos nodded and transformed his mammoth form giving a loud cry from his
trunk as he and the robotic dinosaur moved towards the energon cluster where
sunhawk and kup confronted the vok and Megatron...

{Nightshade}

    Looking up at the comm Nightshade gave a lop sided grin, "Guess that
means I'm under house arrest huh? Well I'll behave myself, you best get
going Hot Rod, Megs has some nasty troops with him..."
